description: This Dart source file defines the AppTheme class which provides a static method to generate a customized light theme for a Flutter application using Material 3 design. It specifies various theme properties such as color schemes, button styles, input decoration, navigation bar, and snack bar themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that provides theming configurations for a Flutter application, specifically a static method to create a light theme.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for a light theme using Material 3, with customized colors and styles.
